item.title: 牛客网-MySQL实战
item.description: 1、查找最晚入职员工的所有信息 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 CREATE TABLE employees ( emp_no int(11) NOT NULL, birth_date date NOT NULL, first_name varchar(14) NOT NULL, last_name varchar(16) NOT NULL, gender char(1) NOT NULL, hire_date date NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (emp_no)); 1 2 3 4 5 6 SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date = ( SELECT MAX(hire_date)

item.title: MySQL入门
